content.heroIntro: Welcome to AREA BEACH V LO MARABU, a premium residential development by AREA PROMOTORA in the heart of Lo Marabu, Ciudad Quesada. This exceptional collection of 2-3 bedroom bungalows offers the perfect blend of coastal living and contemporary comfort, with prices starting from just €300,000. Designed for discerning buyers seeking an authentic Costa Blanca lifestyle, AREA BEACH V LO MARABU combines thoughtful architecture with practical amenities in one of Alicante's most vibrant communities. With delivery scheduled for August 2026, this is an ideal opportunity to own a piece of paradise in an area renowned for its established international community, excellent healthcare facilities, and proximity to world-class golf courses and pristine Blue Flag beaches. AREA PROMOTORA's reputation for quality construction and attention to detail ensures your investment is built to the highest standards, offering exceptional value in a market experiencing consistent growth of 8% year-on-year.

locationSection.intro: Lo Marabu in Ciudad Quesada has become one of Costa Blanca's most sought-after residential destinations. This thriving neighborhood combines the tranquility of suburban living with convenient access to beaches, shopping, and cultural amenities. The area is characterized by its cosmopolitan atmosphere, with an established international community where English is widely spoken and understood. Lo Marabu offers the perfect balance for those seeking an escape from urban life without sacrificing modern conveniences. The neighborhood features excellent infrastructure, including quality healthcare facilities within 30 minutes, diverse shopping options from major supermarkets to local markets, and outstanding recreational opportunities including championship golf courses and multiple Blue Flag beaches. Whether you're looking for a permanent residence, a holiday retreat, or an investment property, Lo Marabu provides the ideal setting for a premium lifestyle on the Costa Blanca.

faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. Costa Blanca offers outstanding value with property prices 40% lower than Spanish island markets. faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners can purchase property in Spain without restrictions. You'll need a Spanish tax identification number (NIE), but there are no nationality requirements. AREA PROMOTORA can guide you through the legal process, and we recommend consulting with a specialist property lawyer to ensure smooth completion.
